participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, Jordan is a driven individual who takes pride in his accomplishments.
participant_1.background: My favorite rapper is yo gotti. I am currently looking for a job in baltimore. God has always been put first in my life. I take pride in getting straight as. I am addicted to the hit show empire.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Detail-oriented and hardworking, Taylor often puts pressure on herself to meet high standards in her work.
participant_2.background: I work too much. I think I need a vacation. I am a perfectionist. If things are not done right i will redo them again and again. I take forever to get tasks done so i start early and clock out late.

content.text: Hello!
Hello!
I see that you're looking for a job in Baltimore. What kind of job are you interested in?
I'm not sure yet. I'm open to anything that's a good fit for me.
I see. Well, I'm sure you'll find something great. You seem like a very hard worker.
Thank you! I try my best.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV, play video games, and go out with my friends.
What shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch Empire, Power, and Game of Thrones.
Oh, I love Empire! I'm so excited for the new season.
Me too! I can't wait to see what happens.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play open-world RPGs, like Skyrim and The Witcher.
Oh, I love those games too! I've been playing Skyrim for years.
Me too! It's so much fun.
What do you like to do with your friends?
We go out to eat, go to movies, and play video games.
Oh, that sounds fun. I wish I had more friends to do things with.
You should try joining a club or a group that shares your interests.
I'll think about it.
Good! I'm sure you'll make some great friends.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
